languages.text: "...Поступили новые данные, Лорд-капитан: нам удалось засечь остаточный тепловой след на одном из континентов Гордости Сантиэля, однако источник его неясен. Команда ждет дальнейших указаний и молится о спасении душ усопших с особым усердием".

traits.locale_text: "...Поступили новые данные, Лорд-капитан: нам удалось засечь остаточный тепловой след на одном из континентов Гордости Сантиэля, однако источник его неясен. Команда ждет дальнейших указаний и молится о спасении душ усопших с особым усердием".

languages.text: "New information has arrived. Lord Captain, we managed to detect a residual heat signature on one of the continents of Santiel's Pride, but there is no clear indication of its origin. The crew is waiting for further instructions and praying for the souls of the deceased with extraordinary zeal."
languages.original_text: "...Поступили новые данные, Лорд-капитан: нам удалось засечь остаточный тепловой след на одном из континентов Гордости Сантиэля, однако источник его неясен. Команда ждет дальнейших указаний и молится о спасении душ усопших с особым усердием".

Lord Captain, we managed to detect a residual heat signature on one of the continents of Santiel's Pride, but there is no clear indication of its origin. The crew is waiting for further instructions and praying for the souls of the deceased with utmost perseverance."

"New information has arrived. Lord Captain, we managed to detect a residual heat signature on one of the continents of Santiel's Pride, but there is no clear indication of its origin. The crew is waiting for further instructions and praying for the souls of the deceased with extraordinary zeal."

languages.text: « De nouvelles informations nous sont parvenues. {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons détecté une signature thermique résiduelle sur l'un des continents de la Gloire de Santiel, mais son origine reste floue. L'équipage attend de nouvelles instructions, tout en priant pour les âmes des défunts avec un zèle redoublé. »
languages.original_text: "New information has arrived. Lord Captain, we managed to detect a residual heat signature on one of the continents of Santiel's Pride, but there is no clear indication of its origin. The crew is waiting for further instructions and praying for the souls of the deceased with extraordinary zeal."

traits.locale_text: « De nouvelles informations nous sont parvenues. {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons détecté une signature thermique résiduelle sur l'un des continents de la Gloire de Santiel, mais son origine reste floue. L'équipage attend de nouvelles instructions, tout en priant pour les âmes des défunts avec un zèle redoublé. »

languages.text: “我们收到了新的消息，舰长大人。我们发现桑提尔之傲的其中一片大陆上残留着热源信号，但并没有明确的来源。船员们正在热忱地为那些死难者的灵魂祈祷，等待您的进一步指示。”
languages.original_text: "New information has arrived. Lord Captain, we managed to detect a residual heat signature on one of the continents of Santiel's Pride, but there is no clear indication of its origin. The crew is waiting for further instructions and praying for the souls of the deceased with extraordinary zeal."

traits.locale_text: “我们收到了新的消息，舰长大人。我们发现桑提尔之傲的其中一片大陆上残留着热源信号，但并没有明确的来源。船员们正在热忱地为那些死难者的灵魂祈祷，等待您的进一步指示。”

languages.text: "Es sind neue Informationen eingetroffen. Lord Captain, wir konnten auf einem der Kontinente auf Santiels Stolz eine schwache Hitzesignatur entdecken, doch es gibt keine klaren Hinweise auf ihren Ursprung. Die Crew wartet auf weitere Anweisungen und betet mit außergewöhnlichem Eifer für die Seelen der Verstorbenen."
languages.original_text: "New information has arrived. Lord Captain, we managed to detect a residual heat signature on one of the continents of Santiel's Pride, but there is no clear indication of its origin. The crew is waiting for further instructions and praying for the souls of the deceased with extraordinary zeal."

traits.locale_text: "Es sind neue Informationen eingetroffen. Lord Captain, wir konnten auf einem der Kontinente auf Santiels Stolz eine schwache Hitzesignatur entdecken, doch es gibt keine klaren Hinweise auf ihren Ursprung. Die Crew wartet auf weitere Anweisungen und betet mit außergewöhnlichem Eifer für die Seelen der Verstorbenen."

languages.text: «Hemos recibido nueva información. Lord Capitán, hemos detectado una señal de calor residual en uno de los continentes de Orgullo de Santiel, pero el origen no está claro. Los miembros de la tripulación esperan recibir instrucciones mientras rezan emocionados por las almas de los fallecidos».
languages.original_text: "New information has arrived. Lord Captain, we managed to detect a residual heat signature on one of the continents of Santiel's Pride, but there is no clear indication of its origin. The crew is waiting for further instructions and praying for the souls of the deceased with extraordinary zeal."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos recibido nueva información. Lord Capitán, hemos detectado una señal de calor residual en uno de los continentes de Orgullo de Santiel, pero el origen no está claro. Los miembros de la tripulación esperan recibir instrucciones mientras rezan emocionados por las almas de los fallecidos».

languages.text: 「新たな情報が届きました。ロード・キャプテン、我々はサンティエル・プライドの大陸のひとつで残留熱の兆候の検出に成功しましたが、その発生元はハッキリしていません。クルーは続けて指示を待っており、とても熱心に死者の魂のために祈っています」
languages.original_text: "New information has arrived. Lord Captain, we managed to detect a residual heat signature on one of the continents of Santiel's Pride, but there is no clear indication of its origin. The crew is waiting for further instructions and praying for the souls of the deceased with extraordinary zeal."

traits.locale_text: 「新たな情報が届きました。ロード・キャプテン、我々はサンティエル・プライドの大陸のひとつで残留熱の兆候の検出に成功しましたが、その発生元はハッキリしていません。クルーは続けて指示を待っており、とても熱心に死者の魂のために祈っています」

languages.text: "Yeni bilgiler geldi. Lord Kaptan, Santiel'in Gururu'ndaki kıtaların birinde bir yerleşim yerine ait ısı tespiti yapmayı başardık ancak ısının neyden kaynaklı olduğunu gösteren net bir şey yok. Mürettebat, talimatlarınızı bekliyor ve kaybedilenlerin ruhları için muazzam bir gayretle dua okuyor."
languages.original_text: "New information has arrived. Lord Captain, we managed to detect a residual heat signature on one of the continents of Santiel's Pride, but there is no clear indication of its origin. The crew is waiting for further instructions and praying for the souls of the deceased with extraordinary zeal."
